features: ✨【Built-in 13000+ Classic Games】The retro game console comes with 13000+ classic games from the 80s and 90s on a 64GB TF card, Including 9+ simulator games. Get this wireless game stick, you can experience multiple games, cost-effective! Enjoy the limitless gaming possibilities with our Wireless Game Simulator, which comes pre-loaded with 13,000+ timeless classic for all gamers to experience beyond their wildest dreams!

🍀【4K HD Output/Plug and Play】This Plug and Play game console is suitable for 4K UHD TV, PC, monitor, projector which supports HDMI connection (not AV output).You can enjoy vivid and exciting video games on the big screen for a more comfortable gaming experience. Lose yourself in the mesmerizing 4K ultra-clear resolution, wireless retro game console bringing you closer to the virtual world filled with challenges and incredible feats!

🎮【2.4G Wireless Game Console】Our wireless nostalgia gaming console uses advanced 2.4GHz radio frequency. Give you a range of 10 meters.You can play with it anywhere you want in the living room without worrying about having to get too close for your eyes. Easily carry your game console with you wherever you go without having to worry about wire tangles and mess, thanks to its wireless and compact design that allows for excellent portability.

✨【Easy to Set Up and Use】 Simply connect the plug and play Nostalgia Stick video game directly to your TV's HDMI port for an easy 4K game stick lite that works seamlessly every time. The retro game stick with 10 pre installed emulators and a 64 TF card, you can start playing right out of the box. No need to download or install anything, even without the Internet, you can easily play your favorite games at any time.

🎁【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adult】Our plug and play video games console is not only a great gift for kids, but also for adults who want to relive the stress-free days of the 80s and 90s. Our retro game simulator comes with 2 wireless game controllers so you can share your favorite games with your friends, family and loved ones. For the perfect present for any gaming enthusiast, look no further, as our Wireless Game console impresses any gamer right away.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2023 New Nostalgia Game Stick with Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers Gamepad Wireless game console is a must for any true game enthusiasts.The plug and play video game stick features more than 13,000 vivid games all in 4K ultra high definition, making it an entertaining and immersive experience for everyone.The interface is intuitive and easy to use, making it a perfect choice for playing with friends, family and loved ones. Additionally, this simulator makes a great gift for any special occasion.

Built-in 13000+ Classic Games The retro game console Built-in 13000+ Classic Games. There’s every classic game you can imagine, without any advertising or additional costs. Let you play non-repetitive games every day, bringing you back to Childhood Memories instantly .

Note： If you experience problems with the gaming interface display, simply reinsert the HDMI cable or unplug the cable and reinsert the joystick and receiver.If the game controller operation is not smooth, please turn off and then restart the switch.

How to Use the Retro Game console Before connecting the power supply, insert the TF card.Insert the game stick into the TV/Computer HDMI interface.Using the charging adapter to connect to the power will automatically turn on.Use the game controller to select the game you want to play.

64GB Large Memory Card The retro game console comes with 13000+ classic games from the 80s and 90s on a 64GB TF card.No need to download games online, just plug in your device and play your favorite retro games. HDMI Connection for Multiple Disply This Plug and Play game console is suitable for 4K UHD TV, PC, monitor, projector which supports HDMI connection (not AV output). 4k Ultra HD resolution makes your gaming experience more lively and exciting. 2.4G Wireless Controllers Wireless nostalgia gaming console uses advanced 2.4GHz radio frequency. Give you a range of 10 meters.You can play with it anywhere you want in the living room without worrying about having to get too close for your eyes.
The package of the game stick includes： 2 X Wireless Controllers1 X Game Stick1 X USB cable1 X 64G TF card1 X User Manual
